name: rub-reveal-lecture-example
description: RUB Group Theory Lecture example using reveal.js presentations
author: Christopher Koerber

scripts.copy:html: cp index.html build/ && cp audio.html build/ && rsync -r --verbose --include='slides/*/*.html' --include='*/' --exclude='*' --prune-empty-dirs .  build/
scripts.copy:static: rsync -r --verbose --copy-links --exclude='*' --prune-empty-dirs static build/ && cp favicon.ico build/
scripts.copy:media: npm run copy:images && npm run copy:audio && npm run copy:movies
scripts.copy:prod: npm run copy:html && npm run copy:static && npm run copy:media
scripts.mkdir:vendor: mkdir -p build/node_modules/reveal.js/dist && mkdir -p build/node_modules/reveal.js/plugin/markdown && mkdir -p build/node_modules/reveal.js/plugin/search/ && mkdir -p build/node_modules/reveal.js/plugin/math/ && mkdir -p build/node_modules/reveal.js-plugins/audio-slideshow/
scripts.vendor:prod: cp node_modules/reveal.js/dist/reveal.js build/node_modules/reveal.js/dist/reveal.js && cp node_modules/reveal.js/plugin/search/search.js build/node_modules/reveal.js/plugin/search/search.js && cp node_modules/reveal.js/plugin/markdown/markdown.js build/node_modules/reveal.js/plugin/markdown/markdown.js && cp node_modules/reveal.js/dist/reveal.css build/node_modules/reveal.js/dist/reveal.css && cp -r node_modules/reveal.js/plugin/math/ build/node_modules/reveal.js/plugin/ && cp node_modules/reveal.js-plugins/audio-slideshow/plugin.js build/node_modules/reveal.js-plugins/audio-slideshow/plugin.js
scripts.prebuild:prod: npm run clean:prod && npm run mkdir:prod && npm run copy:prod && npm run fonts:prod
scripts.build:prod: npm run css:prod && npm run js:prod && npm run mkdir:vendor && npm run vendor:prod
scripts.zip:prod: npm run build:prod && zip -r gt-lecture.zip build
